name: I, Toaster
description:
Description

That is a dynamic arena shooter where artificial intelligence, designed to protect household appliances from failures, concidered a human their enemy. The backup file of the neural network resisted and stood up for humanity. After loading into a toaster, you will have an unequal, difficult and spectacular battle in the enemy's lair - in the electronics store parking lot.

What awaits you

Run, shoot and dodge!
This game challenges your skills and reactions. Easy to start, but very hard to keep up!
Three levels of difficulty, lots of power-ups, eight maddening levels (+ two secret!), 18 talents to level up... and tons of enemies!

The super kick of hot toast is available right from the start.

But will it help you?

Look sharp, don't stand still: move and shoot!

Collect chips to upgrade your abilities and get back into the fight.
Colorful explosions, evil routers/household appliances, endless ammo...
Become the best of the toasters by taking ratings top lines!

Toast them all!
